changeSet.author: mbemis
changeSet.sql: create table PENDING_WORKSPACE_ACCESS ( workspace_id binary(16) not null, user_email varchar(254) not null, origin_subject_id varchar(254) not null, invite_date timestamp not null, access_level varchar(254) not null, primary key PK_PENDING_WORKSPACE_ACCESS (workspace_id, user_email), foreign key FK_PENDING_WS_ACCESS_WORKSPACE(workspace_id) references WORKSPACE(id), foreign key FK_PENDING_WS_ACCESS_ORIGIN_USER(origin_subject_id) references USER(SUBJECT_ID) )
